Key Match Events: Ryan Mendes scored a penalty to give Cape Verde the lead in the 89th minute.
Babacar Niasse of Mauritania received a yellow card for an infringement in the 88th minute.
Aboubakary Koita of Mauritania came close with a long-range free kick in the 90+6 minute.
Cape Verde qualified for the Quarter-finals with a 1-0 victory over Mauritania.
Pre-Game Insights: Cape Verde was considered one of the 'underdogs' but continued to surprise everyone with their performance.
Cape Verde finished on top of Group B, which included teams like Ghana, Egypt, and Mozambique.
Post-Match Reflections: Cape Verde's unbeaten run remains intact after their match with Mauritania.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match took place at Abidjan’s Félix Houphouët Boigny stadium on January 29, 2024.
